00058 class CFileDataIO
00059 {
00060 public:
00065     virtual ~CFileDataIO();
00066     
00067     
00071     virtual uint64 GetPosition() const = 0;
00072     
00076     virtual uint64 GetLength() const = 0;
00077 
00081     virtual bool Eof() const;
00082 
00083     
00091     virtual uint64 Seek(sint64 offset, wxSeekMode from = wxFromStart) const;
00092 
00093  
00109     virtual void Read(void* buffer, size_t count) const;
00110 
00122     virtual void Write(const void* buffer, size_t count);
00123 
00124     
00131     virtual uint8       ReadUInt8() const;
00132     virtual uint16      ReadUInt16() const;
00133     virtual uint32      ReadUInt32() const;
00134     virtual uint64      ReadUInt64() const;
00135     virtual CUInt128    ReadUInt128() const;
00136     virtual CMD4Hash    ReadHash() const;
00137     virtual float       ReadFloat() const;
00138     virtual unsigned char*  ReadBsob(uint8* size) const;
00140 
00155     virtual wxString    ReadString(bool bOptUTF8, uint8 lenBytes = 2, bool SafeRead = false) const;
00156 
00167     virtual wxString    ReadOnlyString(bool bOptUTF8, uint16 length) const;
00168 
00169     
00176     virtual void WriteUInt8(uint8 value);
00177     virtual void WriteUInt16(uint16 value);
00178     virtual void WriteUInt32(uint32 value);
00179     virtual void WriteUInt64(uint64 value);
00180     virtual void WriteUInt128(const CUInt128& value);
00181     virtual void WriteHash(const CMD4Hash& value);
00182     virtual void WriteFloat(float value);
00183     virtual void WriteBsob( const unsigned char* val, uint8 size);  
00185     
00198     virtual void WriteString(const wxString& str, EUtf8Str encoding = utf8strNone, uint8 lenBytes = 2);
00199 
00200 /* Warning: Special Kad functions, needs documentation */
00201 
00202     CTag*       ReadTag(bool bOptACP = false) const;
00203     void        ReadTagPtrList(TagPtrList* taglist, bool bOptACP = false) const;
00204 
00205     void        WriteTag(const CTag& tag);
00206     void        WriteTagPtrList(const TagPtrList& tagList);
00207 
00208 /* Special ED2Kv2 function */
00209     uint64      GetIntTagValue() const;
00210 
00211 /* Some functions I added for simplicity */
00212     // Very obvious 
00213     bool IsEmpty() { return (GetLength() == 0); }
00214 
00215     // Appends to the end
00216     void Append(const uint8* buffer, int n) { Seek(0, wxFromEnd); Write(buffer, n); }
00217 
00218 protected:
00236     virtual sint64 doRead(void* buffer, size_t count) const = 0;
00237     virtual sint64 doWrite(const void* buffer, size_t count) = 0;
00239 
00250     virtual sint64 doSeek(sint64 offset) const = 0;
00251 
00252 private:
00261     void WriteStringCore(const char* str, EUtf8Str encoding, uint8 lenBytes);
00262 };
